resources.string: Enter recipe name/ link from allrecipes.com (or share from browser).\nThen click the arrow to proceed
The Link is not for a recipe in allrecipes.com
\u25E6 \'\'next/previous page\'\' - to toggle between pages of the app
\u25E6 \'\'stop/continue checking\'\' - to stop or continue checking the checklist by voice\n\u25E6 \'\'next/previous page\'\' - to toggle between pages of the app
\u25E6 \'\'read the ingredients/instructions\'\'\n\u25E6 \'\'next/previous page\'\' - to toggle between pages of the app

\u25E6 \'\'read the ingredients/instructions\'\' - to be read by the bot for you\n\u25E6 \'\'change recipe\'\' - to reload a recipe\n\u25E6 \'\'next/previous page\'\' - to toggle between pages of the app

◦ ''next/previous/repeat instruction'' - to toggle between recipe instructions
◦ ''I have a question'' followed immediately by your question - for general questions about the recipe
 (Note that a pause between the phrase and the question itself may be identified as the end of your input and then the question itself will not be caught in the input)
◦ ''finish'' - to finish the cooking process
◦ ''next/previous page'' - to toggle between pages of the app

\u25E6 \'\'next/previous/repeat instruction\'\' - to toggle between recipe instructions\n\u25E6 \'\'I have a question\'\' followed immediately by your question - for general questions about the recipe\n (Note that a pause between the phrase and the question itself may be identified as the end of your input and then the question itself will not be caught in the input)
